Home.title: We create services to help others build theirs
Home.description: Experts in the creation of specialized applications and services for independents and small businesses. <NewsletterTrigger>Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive insights.</NewsletterTrigger>
Home.all_posts_subtitle: Plain puts all your customer conversations from Slack, email and forms into a single, lightning-fast interface and makes it easy to work with your team. Integrated with the tools you already use, and backed by our powerful API.

Dedale.title: The next-generation e-mail template development environment
Dedale.description: Dédale is a <primary>free service</primary> dedicated to individuals and companies looking to create, develop and organize their e-mail templates with ease.
Dedale.integrate_to: Integrates quickly and easily with these tools
Dedale.integrate_to_tooltip: The tools shown are examples, and any HTML-compatible service can be used.
Dedale.features_title: Everything you need to create high-performance e-mail templates
Dedale.features_description: The ideal tool to help you build e-mail communications with a consistent brand image, while spending as little time as possible.
Dedale.usage_title: A tool for every use case
Dedale.usage_description: Here are three examples of use cases for which an e-mail template can be useful
Dedale.react_email_description: Dédale has been designed with the very latest in email development. We've integrated React Email in an optimized environment with a better preview system.
Dedale.pricing_title: A free service available with or without registration
Dedale.pricing_description: Plain puts all your customer conversations from Slack, email and forms into a single, lightning-fast interface and makes it easy to work with your team. Integrated with the tools you already use, and backed by our powerful API.
Dedale.faq_description: Plain puts all your customer conversations from Slack, email and forms into a single, lightning-fast interface and makes it easy to work with your team. Integrated with the tools you already use, and backed by our powerful API.
